verses.verse: Now when Jacob <WH3290> saw <WH7200> that <WH3588> there was <WH3426> corn <WH7668> in Egypt, <WH4714> Jacob <WH3290> said <WH559> unto his sons, <WH1121> Why <WH4100> do ye look one upon another? <WH7200>

And he said, <WH559> Behold, <WH2009> I have heard <WH8085> that <WH3588> there is <WH3426> corn <WH7668> in Egypt: <WH4714> get you down <WH3381> thither, <WH8033> and buy <WH7666> for us from thence; <WH4480> <WH8033> that we may live, <WH2421> and not <WH3808> die. <WH4191>
And Joseph's <WH3130> ten <WH6235> brethren <WH251> went down <WH3381> to buy <WH7666> corn <WH1250> in Egypt. <WH4480> <WH4714>

But Benjamin, <WH1144> Joseph's <WH3130> brother, <WH251> Jacob <WH3290> sent <WH7971> not <WH3808> with <WH854> his brethren; <WH251> for <WH3588> he said, <WH559> Lest peradventure <WH6435> mischief <WH611> befall <WH7122> him.

And the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> came <WH935> to buy <WH7666> corn among <WH8432> those that came: <WH935> for <WH3588> the famine <WH7458> was <WH1961> in the land <WH776> of Canaan. <WH3667>

And Joseph <WH3130> was the governor <WH7989> over <WH5921> the land, <WH776> and he <WH1931> it was that sold <WH7666> to all <WH3605> the people <WH5971> of the land: <WH776> and Joseph's <WH3130> brethren <WH251> came, <WH935> and bowed down themselves <WH7812> before him with their faces <WH639> to the earth. <WH776>

And Joseph <WH3130> saw <WH7200> <WH853> his brethren, <WH251> and he knew <WH5234> them, but made himself strange <WH5234> unto <WH413> them, and spoke <WH1696> roughly <WH7186> unto <WH854> them; and he said <WH559> unto <WH413> them, Whence <WH4480> <WH370> come <WH935> ye? And they said, <WH559> From the land <WH4480> <WH776> of Canaan <WH3667> to buy <WH7666> food. <WH400>
And Joseph <WH3130> knew <WH5234> <WH853> his brethren, <WH251> but they <WH1992> knew <WH5234> not <WH3808> him.

And Joseph <WH3130> remembered <WH2142> <WH853> the dreams <WH2472> which <WH834> he dreamed <WH2492> of them, and said <WH559> unto <WH413> them, Ye <WH859> are spies; <WH7270> to see <WH7200> <WH853> the nakedness <WH6172> of the land <WH776> ye are come. <WH935>
And they said <WH559> unto <WH413> him, Nay, <WH3808> my lord, <WH113> but to buy <WH7666> food <WH400> are thy servants <WH5650> come. <WH935>
We <WH5168> are all <WH3605> one <WH259> man's <WH376> sons; <WH1121> we <WH587> are true <WH3651> men, thy servants <WH5650> are <WH1961> no <WH3808> spies. <WH7270>
And he said <WH559> unto <WH413> them, Nay, <WH3808> but <WH3588> to see <WH7200> the nakedness <WH6172> of the land <WH776> ye are come. <WH935>

And they said, <WH559> Thy servants <WH5650> are twelve <WH8147> <WH6240> brethren, <WH251> the sons <WH1121> of one <WH259> man <WH376> in the land <WH776> of Canaan; <WH3667> and, behold, <WH2009> the youngest <WH6996> is this day <WH3117> with <WH854> our father, <WH1> and one <WH259> is not. <WH369>
And Joseph <WH3130> said <WH559> unto <WH413> them, That <WH1931> is it that <WH834> I spoke <WH1696> unto <WH413> you, saying, <WH559> Ye <WH859> are spies: <WH7270>

Hereby <WH2063> ye shall be proved: <WH974> By the life <WH2416> of Pharaoh <WH6547> ye shall not go forth <WH3318> hence, <WH4480> <WH2088> except <WH3588> <WH518> your youngest <WH6996> brother <WH251> come <WH935> hither. <WH2008>

Send <WH7971> one <WH259> of <WH4480> you, and let him fetch <WH3947> <WH853> your brother, <WH251> and ye <WH859> shall be kept in prison, <WH631> that your words <WH1697> may be proved, <WH974> whether there be any truth <WH571> in <WH854> you: or else <WH518> <WH3808> by the life <WH2416> of Pharaoh <WH6547> surely <WH3588> ye <WH859> are spies. <WH7270>
And he put them all together <WH622> <WH853> into <WH413> ward <WH4929> three <WH7969> days. <WH3117>
And Joseph <WH3130> said <WH559> unto <WH413> them the third <WH7992> day, <WH3117> This <WH2063> do, <WH6213> and live; <WH2421> for I <WH589> fear <WH3373> <WH853> God: <WH430>

If <WH518> ye <WH859> be true <WH3651> men, let one <WH259> of your brethren <WH251> be bound <WH631> in the house <WH1004> of your prison: <WH4929> go <WH1980> ye, <WH859> carry <WH935> corn <WH7668> for the famine <WH7459> of your houses: <WH1004>
But bring <WH935> your youngest <WH6996> brother <WH251> unto <WH413> me; so shall your words <WH1697> be verified, <WH539> and ye shall not <WH3808> die. <WH4191> And they did <WH6213> so. <WH3651>

And they said <WH559> one <WH376> to <WH413> another, <WH251> We <WH587> are verily <WH61> guilty <WH818> concerning <WH5921> our brother, <WH251> in that <WH834> we saw <WH7200> the anguish <WH6869> of his soul, <WH5315> when he besought <WH2603> <WH413> us, and we would not <WH3808> hear; <WH8085> therefore <WH5921> <WH3651> is this <WH2063> distress <WH6869> come <WH935> upon <WH413> us.

And Reuben <WH7205> answered <WH6030> them, saying, <WH559> Spoke <WH559> I not <WH3808> unto <WH413> you, saying, <WH559> Do not <WH408> sin <WH2398> against the child; <WH3206> and ye would not <WH3808> hear? <WH8085> therefore, behold, <WH2009> also <WH1571> his blood <WH1818> is required. <WH1875>
And they <WH1992> knew <WH3045> not <WH3808> that <WH3588> Joseph <WH3130> understood <WH8085> them; for <WH3588> he spoke unto <WH996> them by an interpreter. <WH3887>

And he turned himself about <WH5437> from <WH4480> <WH5921> them, and wept; <WH1058> and returned <WH7725> to <WH413> them again, and communed <WH1696> with <WH413> them, and took <WH3947> from <WH4480> <WH854> them <WH853> Simeon, <WH8095> and bound <WH631> him before their eyes. <WH5869>

Then Joseph <WH3130> commanded <WH6680> to fill <WH4390> <WH853> their sacks <WH3627> with corn, <WH1250> and to restore <WH7725> every man's <WH376> money <WH3701> into <WH413> his sack, <WH8242> and to give <WH5414> them provision <WH6720> for the way: <WH1870> and thus <WH3651> did <WH6213> he unto them.
And they laded <WH5375> <WH5921> their asses <WH2543> with <WH853> the corn, <WH7668> and departed <WH1980> thence. <WH4480> <WH8033>

And as one <WH259> of them opened <WH6605> <WH853> his sack <WH8242> to give <WH5414> his ass <WH2543> provender <WH4554> in the inn, <WH4411> he espied <WH7200> <WH853> his money; <WH3701> for, behold, <WH2009> it <WH1931> was in his sack's <WH572> mouth. <WH6310>

And he said <WH559> unto <WH413> his brethren, <WH251> My money <WH3701> is restored; <WH7725> and, lo, <WH2009> it is even <WH1571> in my sack: <WH572> and their heart <WH3820> failed <WH3318> them, and they were afraid, <WH2729> saying <WH559> one <WH376> to <WH413> another, <WH251> What <WH4100> is this <WH2063> that God <WH430> hath done <WH6213> unto us?

And they came <WH935> unto <WH413> Jacob <WH3290> their father <WH1> unto the land <WH776> of Canaan, <WH3667> and told <WH5046> him <WH853> all <WH3605> that befell <WH7136> unto them; saying, <WH559>
The man, <WH376> who is the lord <WH113> of the land, <WH776> spoke <WH1696> roughly <WH7186> to <WH854> us, and took <WH5414> us for spies <WH7270> of <WH853> the country. <WH776>
And we said <WH559> unto <WH413> him, We <WH587> are true <WH3651> men; we are <WH1961> no <WH3808> spies: <WH7270>

We <WH587> be twelve <WH8147> <WH6240> brethren, <WH251> sons <WH1121> of our father; <WH1> one <WH259> is not, <WH369> and the youngest <WH6996> is this day <WH3117> with <WH854> our father <WH1> in the land <WH776> of Canaan. <WH3667>

And the man, <WH376> the lord <WH113> of the country, <WH776> said <WH559> unto <WH413> us, Hereby <WH2063> shall I know <WH3045> that <WH3588> ye <WH859> are true <WH3651> men; leave <WH5117> one <WH259> of your brethren <WH251> here with <WH854> me, and take <WH3947> food for the famine <WH7459> of your households, <WH1004> and be gone: <WH1980>

And bring <WH935> <WH853> your youngest <WH6996> brother <WH251> unto <WH413> me: then shall I know <WH3045> that <WH3588> ye <WH859> are no <WH3808> spies, <WH7270> but <WH3588> that ye <WH859> are true <WH3651> men: so will I deliver <WH5414> you <WH853> your brother, <WH251> and ye shall traffic <WH5503> in the land. <WH776>

And it came to pass <WH1961> as they <WH1992> emptied <WH7324> their sacks, <WH8242> that, behold, <WH2009> every man's <WH376> bundle <WH6872> of money <WH3701> was in his sack: <WH8242> and when both they <WH1992> and their father <WH1> saw <WH7200> <WH853> the bundles <WH6872> of money, <WH3701> they were afraid. <WH3372>

And Jacob <WH3290> their father <WH1> said <WH559> unto <WH413> them, Me have ye bereaved <WH7921> of my children: Joseph <WH3130> is not, <WH369> and Simeon <WH8095> is not, <WH369> and ye will take <WH3947> Benjamin <WH1144> away: all <WH3605> these things are <WH1961> against <WH5921> me.

And Reuben <WH7205> spoke <WH559> unto <WH413> his father, <WH1> saying, <WH559> Slay <WH4191> <WH853> my two <WH8147> sons, <WH1121> if <WH518> I bring <WH935> him not <WH3808> to <WH413> thee: deliver <WH5414> him into <WH5921> my hand, <WH3027> and I <WH589> will bring <WH7725> him to <WH413> thee again.

And he said, <WH559> My son <WH1121> shall not <WH3808> go down <WH3381> with <WH5973> you; for <WH3588> his brother <WH251> is dead, <WH4191> and he <WH1931> is left <WH7604> alone: <WH905> if mischief <WH611> befall <WH7122> him by the way <WH1870> in the which <WH834> ye go, <WH1980> then shall ye bring down <WH3381> <WH853> my gray hairs <WH7872> with sorrow <WH3015> to the grave. <WH7585>
